title: How to recover data from an SD card that is not detectable or readable on any device - Quora

response.answer_text: As your SD card id not detectable on any device including your Windows PC, I recommend you to fix try to fix it using some troubleshooting techniques. Here I am listing some techniques that you should avoid perform in order to fix SD card not detectable issue on your Windows PC. Before performing these troubleshooting, first check SD card on any other device. If the issue still persists, follow these techniques: Change the SD Card Drive Letter.Update SD Card Drivers.Use an Antivirus to Check for Malware Attack.Run CHKDSK and Fix SD Card Errors.In order to learn more about the steps involved in these techniques, check out this tutorial video. The video will also help you in learning about the technique to restore data from an undetectable SD card.
